CustomField.formula: IF( OR( CONTAINS(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Owner_Role_Copy__c ,"SMB"), CONTAINS(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Price_Book_Name__c , "Express" ), SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Small_Fleet_Opportunity__c ), "SMB", IF( OR( CONTAINS(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Industrial"), SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Industrial_Oppty__c = TRUE ), "Industrial", IF( CONTAINS(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Connected Worker"), "Connected Worker", IF( OR( CONTAINS(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Experimental"), CONTAINS(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Owner_Role_Copy__c,"MM"), CONTAINS(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Mid Market") ), "Mid Market", IF( OR( CONTAINS(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Major"), CONTAINS(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Enterprise"), CONTAINS(SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Owner_Role_Copy__c,"Field") ), "Enterprise", "Other" ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Owner Segment
